newsitem.title: USA: Credit rise on stocks not out of line--Greenspan.
newsitem.headline: Credit rise on stocks not out of line--Greenspan.

text.p: An expansion in margin credit on stocks has been in proportion to the rise in values, Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan said on Wednesday.
"There's no question that in the last couple of months, margin credit has risen substantially," Greenspan told the Senate Banking Committee when questioned during his Humphrey-Hawkins testimony.
Still, he said, the rise as a percentage of market value was not exceptionally high by historical standards.
